casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 8, 2008

[Cite as 05/08/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-2160.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-2264. State v. Diar.

Lorain C.P. No. 04CR065248. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas for Lorain County. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that the record in this case be supplemented with the “Post Sentence Report” filed in the trial court on March 20, 2006.
